name: Successfully updating and re-logging in with a new password

steps.name: Given I am logged in as a platform administrator
Log in as a platform administrator
And I navigate to the User Management section to update the password
Navigate to the User Management section
When I enter matching passwords that meet the required complexity standards
Then the system logs me out automatically relogin with updated password
Then I am successfully logged in

attachments.name: Successfully updating and re-logging in with a new password (Pass)

fullName: Platform Admin Password Management: Successfully updating and re-logging in with a new password
